See all 5 comments Kenneth Lou04 Oct 2018Yeah @Loh Tat Tian, the difficult one is usually the Tax Relief portions... even we get confused every year!Loh Tat Tian04 Oct 2018Tax Relief are generally based on criteria. Its quite easy to follow through if you download their Excel provided at IRAS page. Then go through which criteria do you hit, e.g most of the time, the relief comes on 3 subjects


1) Dependents spending e.g (handicap / parents relief / child etc)
2) Retirement Planning (SRS, retirement sum topping up)
